sentence: The room was spacious and clean
Clean pool room hot shower
The room was very nice clean and spacious
The room was perfect for two people
She found us a clean room in a couple of minutes and we were on our way
Nice room and pool
The room was very nice and check in was super easyThe ac was out in the lobby The restaurant had a limited menu and one woman that was in management kept giving us dirty looks for no reason
Rooms are large and comfortable
room was very clean and spacious
Convenient to airport friendly staff clean rooms

During my stay there was a 24 hr power outage elevators not working even after power restored various issues inside the room AC not working though it was repaired on intimation toilet flush broken etc etc
The front desk mentioned that no more king rooms were available and that I could be moved to a double even though I paid for a king when I booked online in advance
The bed was lumpy and and room had an awful smell too and there silverfish all over the place and the toilet broke

In its current state cockroach and bugs in room strong bleach and mildew smell mustiness damp carpets very dim rooms poor water pressure in shower noisy a c there is hardly anything desirable about staying at this Holiday Inn
Room was weirdly humid even after running the ac nonstop but hopefully that was just my room
Cleanliness of the room desired to be better
Check in was rather fast and ok but going to my room I quickly realized why the hotel was available at such a discount it apparently has not been updated since 197
Found bugs on bathroom and room floor
A coworker traveled with me on the second trip he said the bathroom in his room was moldy
We are traveling with small children and were given rooms along the highway so we have been listening to cars and trucks from 11 pm to 4 am non stop
